entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS] CollectionView item cells do not resize when the content size is changed #21141
  • Unable to create XUnit Project referencing .NET 8 MAUI #21138
  • NavigationPage shows title bar before navigating #21134
  • DisplayPromptAsync not working in iOS 17.4 #21131
  • Infinite ANR loop in MAUI UI with Android 13 #21130
  • HttpClient(AndroidMessageHandler) with NTLM v2 auth and Self Signed Certificate returns 401 Unauthorized #21128
  • Flyout menu overlaps with title bar since .Net8 #21127

Closed

  • ImageButton Padding & Ripple effect stops working with .NET 8 #18857
  • SearchBar crashes App on IOS by click on it to type #21139
  • iOS - Shell - SetTabBarIsVisible does not resize the page to take up the space left by the tab bar #21135
  • Unexpected UI Disruption Upon Invoking .Focus() Method on DatePicker and TimePicker Controls with IsVisible Set to False #20380
  • AOT + Trim - Could not resolve type with token 01000005 from typeref #21082
  • Please add Combo Box to .Net Maui #21111
  • Documentation is wrong/missing: How to upload MAUI app to Google Play Store? #21132
  • [regression/8.0.3] MauiImage Build action not working properly #18765
  • can not set Grid.Column to NavigationPage? #21114
  • OperatingSystem.IsIOSVersionAtLeast() iOS/MacCatalyst mismatch makes it impossible to guard some features #21106
  • OnNavigatedTo/OnNavigatedFrom cannot access args.DestinationPage/args.PreviousPage #21123
  • Xamalicious malware in Maui!? #21117
  • PKPass Initialization crashes on iOS 17.4 #21115
  • PlatformImage.FromStream not loading image #21126

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Round item size in GridView #21142
    platform/windows 🪟, area/layout 🔲, area/collectionview 📃
  • [iSS] Fix ui loop #21140

Merged

  • [Trimming] Fix ILLink warnings in source generated code #21054
    area/Xaml </>
  • Stable branding for SR3 #21137
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview2] Update Sdk and installer #21107
  • [XC] Compile bindings with Source #20610
    area/Xaml </>
  • Document ICanvas #20881
    area/docs 📓

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix image button scaling #20953
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Testing] Updated to latest RC.5 of Appium #20694
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Catalyst] Fix Image not rendering in Mac Idiom (Device family = 6) Button #21048
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, control-button
  • [Windows] Implement `IdleSynchronizer` #20630
    platform/windows 🪟
  • [Windows] Fix margin on title bar #17729
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale
  • [Trimming] Enable trimming and AOT analyzers in Core #21076
    area/app-size 🤏
  • Add Helpers to aide Debugging MSBuild tasks #20695
  • Propagate the app theme to all children #19931
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Trimming] Use type converters instead of implicit cast operators (part 1/2) #21050
    area/Xaml </>
  • Make sure to await async test asserts (2) #20506
    area/testing, community ✨
  • [XamlC] Avoid calling ResourceDictionary.SetAndLoadSource #20776
    area/Xaml </>
  • [iOS] Implemented PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden, PrefersStatusBarHidden and PreferredStatusBarUpdateAnimation Platform Specifics #20069
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/platform
